Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers I
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers II
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers III
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers IV
VITROS Chemistry Products DAT Performance Verifiers V
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS Chemistry Products OP Reagent, Calibrator Kit 26, and DAT Performance Verifiers for semi-quantitative/qualitative detection of opiates in urine on VITROS 5,1 FS Chemistry Systems
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use in semi-quantitative or qualitative determination of opiates in human urine, to aid in the diagnosis and treatment of opiate use or overdose; calibrators and controls for drugs of abuse measurement on VITROS 5,1 FS Chemistry Systems
